headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: saved_audience_ids
parameters.description: IDs of Saved Audiences. Max size: 100. To create Saved Audiences and obtain the Saved Audience IDs, use /dmp/saved_audience/create/ .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Return code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Return codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Return codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: saved_audiences
fields.description: A list of Saved Audiences.

fields.name: saved_audience_id
fields.description: Saved Audience ID.

fields.name: saved_audience_name
fields.description: Saved Audience name.

fields.name: location_ids
fields.description: IDs of the locations that you want to target.

fields.name: gender
fields.description: Your targeted gender. Enum values: GENDER_FEMALE , GENDER_MALE , GENDER_UNLIMITED

fields.name: age_groups
fields.description: Your targeted age groups. For enum values, see Enumeration - Targeting Age Group .

fields.name: languages
fields.description: Codes of the languages that you want to target.

fields.name: audience_ids
fields.description: List of audience IDs.

fields.name: excluded_audience_ids
fields.description: List of audience IDs to be excluded.

fields.name: interest_category_ids
fields.description: Interest classification.

fields.name: interest_keyword_ids
fields.description: IDs of interest keywords to target audience.

fields.name: actions
fields.description: A list of action category objects.

fields.name: action_category_ids
fields.description: IDs of the action categories (behaviors) or hashtags that you want to target.

fields.name: action_scene
fields.description: Where you can collect information about user actions. Enum values: VIDEO_RELATED , CREATOR_RELATED , HASHTAG_RELATED .

fields.name: action_period
fields.description: The time period to include actions from. Enum values: 0 , 7 , 15 . If action_scene is CREATOR_RELATED or HASHTAG_RELATED , 0 will be used regardless of the value you pass in. 0 means that there is no definite timeframe to select actions from.

fields.name: video_user_actions
fields.description: Video-related Actions. If action_scene is VIDEO_RELATED , the allowed values are: WATCHED_TO_END , LIKED , COMMENTED , SHARED . If action_scene is CREATOR_RELATED , the allowed values are: FOLLOWING , VIEW_HOMEPAGE . If action_scene is HASHTAG_RELATED , the allowed value is VIEW_HASHTAG .

fields.name: operating_systems
fields.description: Device operating systems. Enum values: ANDROID , IOS . Only one value is allowed.

fields.name: min_android_version
fields.description: Minimum device Android version. For enum values, see Enumeration - Minimum Android Version .

fields.name: min_ios_version
fields.description: Minimum iOS version. For enum values, see Enumeration - Minimum iOS Version .

fields.name: device_model_ids
fields.description: IDs of the device models.

fields.name: network_types
fields.description: Device connection types. Default: unlimited . For enum values, see Enumeration - Connection Type .

fields.name: carrier_ids
fields.description: Carriers.

fields.name: device_price_ranges
fields.description: Targeting device price range. 10000 means 1000+. The numbers must be in multiples of 50. Important :The upper limit you set will be added by 50 and the resulting new number will be used as the actual upper limit for device targeting. The actual upper limit is shown in the ad group settings in TikTok Ads Manager. If you set and get the price range of [0, 250], it actually means [0, 300].

fields.name: page_info
fields.description: Page information.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Current page number.

fields.name: page_size
fields.description: Paging Size.

fields.name: total_number
fields.description: Total number of results.

fields.name: total_page
fields.description: Total pages.
